root: ^Holy sh*t. There's a whole building underneath it!
^That building doesn't look much like a school, though.
^Is it some sort of an abandoned mansion? But that big sphere is clearly too odd for a place to live.
^Anyway. Why do I hear a buzzing sound?
^Hahaha! You seemed terrified by this projection.
^WHAT DO YOU MEAN? You literally pullout a hologram from nowhere.
^Also I didn’t expect this kind of high-tech stuff to show up in the middle of the woods.
^It just got installed yesterday. Our school is still under some reconstruction.
^So this is actually a school. Uh... A guy called Gerald sent me an invitation, I wonder if I can talk to him...
^Well... I was kinda expecting Gerald to be a younger geeky dude. You know, like a typical hacker image...
^I indeed wish that I could be younger.
^Anyway, let me open the gate for you.
^Wait a second Gerald. If you’re not a troll hacker, how did you know me?
^Why would you invite me, out of all the professionals in this world?
^You know, I’m just a dude that has interest in this field, I’m not even a psychology student.
^That we can talk about in-person. I’ll see you at the porch.
